definition: to enter/to go into/to join/to become a member of/to confirm or agree with/abbr. for 入聲|入声[ru4 sheng1]
medicine/drug/substance used for a specific purpose (e.g. poisoning, explosion, fermenting)/CL:種|种[zhong3],服[fu4],味[wei4]/to poison

definition: to relieve (cold, rheumatic pain etc)/lit. to dispel pathogenic wind (TCM)

to take a tonic or nourishing food to build up one's health
